Armour Pack: Peace, Ice Tiger and Heavy Skull
Ensemble Armure : Peace, Ice Tiger et Heavy Skull
Rüstungsbündel: Peace, Ice Tiger und Heavy Skull
Pacchetto di armature: Peace, Ice Tiger e Heavy Skull
Pack de armadura: Peace, Ice Tiger y Heavy Skull
아머 팩: 평화, 빙호, 무거운 해골 (여성)
Armor Pack: Peace, Ice Tiger and Heavy Skull (Women)
裝甲服裝組：和平、冰虎及沈重骷髏(女用)
裝甲服裝組：和平、冰虎及沈重骷髏(女用)
Armor Pack: Peace, Ice Tiger and Heavy Skull
kDesc

Contains the following three full Armour sets for you to mix and match, Peace Light Armour Set, Ice Tiger Medium Armour Set and Heavy Skull Heavy Armour Set, contains the following fifteen parts: 
 
 1. Peace - Light Field Body Armour 
 2. Peace - Light Field Boots 
 3. Peace - Light Field Glove 
 4. Peace - Light Field Helmet 
 5. Peace - Light Field Leg Armour 
 6. Ice Tiger - Medium Assault Body Armour 
 7. Ice Tiger - Medium Assault Boots 
 8. Ice Tiger - Medium Assault Gloves 
 9. Ice Tiger - Medium Assault Helmet 
 10. Ice Tiger - Medium Assault Leg Armour 
 11. Heavy Skull - Heavy Combat Body Armour 
 12. Heavy Skull - Heavy Combat Boots 
 13. Heavy Skull - Heavy Combat Gloves 
 14. Heavy Skull - Heavy Combat Helmet 
 15. Heavy Skull - Heavy Combat Leg Armour [#Legal]

Vous n'aurez que l'embarras du choix avec ces trois ensembles Armure complets (Ensemble Armure Légère Peace, Ensemble Armure Moyenne Ice Tiger & Ensemble Armure Lourde Heavy Skull), contenant les quinze éléments suivants : 
 
 1. Peace - Gilet de terrain léger 
 2. Peace - Bottes de terrain légères 
 3. Peace - Gant de terrain légers 
 4. Peace - Casque de terrain léger 
 5. Peace - Jambières de terrain légères 
 6. Ice Tiger - Gilet d'assaut moyen 
 7. Ice Tiger - Bottes d'assaut moyennes 
 8. Ice Tiger - Gants d'assaut moyens 
 9. Ice Tiger - Casque d'assaut moyen 
 10. Ice Tiger - Jambières d'assaut moyennes 
 11. Heavy Skull - Gilet de combat lourd 
 12. Heavy Skull - Bottes de combat lourdes 
 13. Heavy Skull - Gants de combat lourds 
 14. Heavy Skull - Casque de combat lourd 
 15. Heavy Skull - Jambières de combat lourdes [#Legal]

Enthält die folgenden drei kompletten Rüstungssets für Dich zum Kombinieren: Leichtes Rüstungsset Peace, Mittelschweres Rüstungsset Ice Tiger & Schweres Rüstungsset Heavy Skull; umfasst die folgenden fünfzehn Teile: 
 
 1. Peace - Leichte Panzerweste 
 2. Peace - Leichte Stiefel 
 3. Peace - Leichte Handschuhe 
 4. Peace - Leichter Helm 
 5. Peace - Leichte Beinrüstung 
 6. Ice Tiger - Panzerweste für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 7. Ice Tiger - Stiefel für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 8. Ice Tiger - Handschuhe für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 9. Ice Tiger - Helm für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 10. Ice Tiger - Beinrüstung für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 11. Heavy Skull - Panzerweste für schwere Kämpfe 
 12. Heavy Skull - Stiefel für schwere Kämpfe 
 13. Heavy Skull - Handschuhe für schwere Kämpfe 
 14. Heavy Skull - Helm für schwere Kämpfe 
 15. Heavy Skull - Beinrüstung für schwere Kämpfe [#Legal]

Contiene i tre set di armature seguenti che possono essere mischiati tra loro: set di armatura leggera Peace, set di armatura media Ice Tiger e set di armatura pesante Heavy Skull. Contiene i 15 componenti seguenti: 
 
 1. Peace - armatura per il corpo da combattimento leggero 
 2. Peace - stivali da combattimento leggero 
 3. Peace - guanti da combattimento leggero 
 4. Peace - casco da combattimento leggero 
 5. Peace - armatura per le gambe da combattimento leggero 
 6. Ice Tiger - armatura per il corpo d'assalto medio 
 7. Ice Tiger - stivali d'assalto medio 
 8. Ice Tiger - guanti d'assalto medio 
 9. Ice Tiger - casco d'assalto medio 
 10. Ice Tiger - armatura per le gambe d'assalto medio 
 11. Heavy Skull - armatura per il corpo da combattimento pesante 
 12. Heavy Skull - stivali da combattimento pesante 
 13. Heavy Skull - guanti da combattimento pesante 
 14. Heavy Skull - casco da combattimento pesante 
 15. Heavy Skull - armatura per le gambe da combattimento pesante [#Legal]

Contiene los tres siguientes sets de armadura, que podrás combinar entre ellos: Peace ligera, Ice Tiger media y Skull Heavy pesada. Se compone de las 15 partes siguientes: 
 
 1. Peace - Armadura corporal de campo ligera 
 2. Peace - Botas de campo ligeras 
 3. Peace - Guantes de campo ligeros 
 4. Peace - Casco de campo ligero 
 5. Peace - Armadura de campo ligera para pierna 
 6. Ice Tiger - Armadura corporal de asalto media 
 7. Ice Tiger - Botas de asalto medias 
 8. Ice Tiger - Guantes de asalto medios 
 9. Ice Tiger - Casco de asalto medio 
 10. Ice Tiger - Armadura de asalto media para pierna 
 11. Heavy Skull - Armadura corporal de combate pesada 
 12. Heavy Skull - Botas de combate pesadas 
 13. Heavy Skull - Guantes de combate pesados 
 14. Heavy Skull - Casco de combate pesado 
 15. Heavy Skull - Armadura de combate pesada para pierna [#Legal]

다음과 같은 세 개의 방어구 세트의 15개 아이템을 포함합니다. 자유로운 연출이 가능합니다 - 평화 경량 방어구 세트, 빙호 중형 방어구 세트, 무거운 해골 강화 방어구 세트:
 
 1. 평화 - 경량 야전 상체방어구 (여성)
 2. 평화 - 경량 야전부츠 (여성)
 3. 평화 - 경량 야전장갑 (여성)
 4. 평화 - 경량 야전헬멧 (여성)
 5. 평화 - 경량 야전 하체방어구 (여성)
 6. 빙호 - 중형 돌격 상체방어구 (여성)
 7. 빙호 - 중형 돌격부츠 (여성)
 8. 빙호 - 중형 돌격장갑 (여성)
 9. 빙호 - 중형 돌격헬멧 (여성)
 10. 빙호 - 중형 돌격 하체방어구 (여성)
 11. 무거운 해골 - 강화 전투 상체방어구 (여성)
 12. 무거운 해골 - 강화 전투부츠 (여성)
 13. 무거운 해골 - 강화 전투장갑 (여성)
 14. 무거운 해골 - 강화 전투헬멧 (여성)
 15. 무거운 해골 - 강화 전투 하체방어구 (여성) [#Legal]

Contains the following three full armor sets for you to mix and match, Peace Light Armor Set, Ice Tiger Medium Armor Set and Heavy Skull Heavy Armor Set, contains the following fifteen parts:
 
 1. Peace - Light Field Body Armor (Women)
 2. Peace - Light Field Boots (Women)
 3. Peace - Light Field Glove (Women)
 4. Peace - Light Field Helmet (Women)
 5. Peace - Light Field Leg Armor (Women)

 8. Ice Tiger - Medium Assault Gloves (Women)
 9. Ice Tiger - Medium Assault Helmet (Women)
 10. Ice Tiger - Medium Assault Leg Armor (Women)
 11. Heavy Skull - Heavy Combat Body Armor (Women)
 12. Heavy Skull - Heavy Combat Boots (Women)
 13. Heavy Skull - Heavy Combat Gloves (Women)
 14. Heavy Skull - Heavy Combat Helmet (Women)
 15. Heavy Skull - Heavy Combat Leg Armor (Women) [#Legal]

包括和平輕型裝甲服裝組、冰虎中型裝甲服裝組及沈重骷髏重型裝甲服裝組3套裝甲服裝組，可用作自由配搭。當中包括下列15個部分：
 
 1. 和平 - 輕型野外護甲(女用)

 6. 冰虎 - 中型突擊護甲(女用)

 8. 冰虎 - 中型突擊手套(女用)
 9. 冰虎 - 中型突擊頭盔(女用)
 10. 冰虎 - 中型突擊護脛(女用)

 12. 沈重骷髏 - 重型戰鬥靴子(女用)
 13. 沈重骷髏 - 重型戰鬥手套(女用)
 14. 沈重骷髏 - 重型戰鬥頭盔(女用)
